data.name: Dead Synchronicity - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Includes the amazing Dead Synchronicity Original Soundtrack in MP3 format with music by indie rock band Kovalski, featuring 20 dark and atmospheric tracks.

MP3-format files will be placed in your Dead Synchronicity folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Dead Synchronicity\Soundtrack

  • 1. Main Theme
  • 2. Good Morning to You, Sir
  • 3. The Cleanup Brigades
  • 4. A Camp Full of Rats
  • 5. Get Out of Here!
  • 6. Mr. Sleepyhead
  • 7. The Underground Highways
  • 8. Morphine Blues
  • 9. Doomsday City
  • 10. Rose's Theme
  • 11. That Crack in the Sky
  • 12. The Guards
  • 13. Suicide Park
  • 14. The Ruins of the Temple
  • 15. Lullaby
  • 16. Oracles and Ashes
  • 17. The Dissolved
  • 18. The Time in Her Eyes
  • 19. Tomorrow Comes Today
  • 20. Boots on Human Faces

data.short_description: Includes the amazing Dead Synchronicity Original Soundtrack in MP3 format with music by indie rock band Kovalski, featuring 20 dark and atmospheric tracks.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: Any MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
